name: Repair-a-bots
description:
Help out your bigger bot friend so he can take down the evil robot monsters that are hidden around the world. A simple top-down coop exploration-based game with heavy-hitting combat and unforgiving battles. Your 3 friends will need to aid you by picking up scrap to heal you, boost you and make you hit a little harder.

*GAME REQUIRES USB CONTROLLERS*

Players: 1-4
